content:
Hello everybody,

my name is Matthias and I am a student of Health Care Computer Science. I am interested in FHIR and I am looking forward to taking part in events regarding FHIR in Germany (Switzerland and Austria also possible). Does anybody know about upcoming events?

Best regards,
Matthias
Welcome to the community! See https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179183-german-(d-a-ch)/topic/Veranstaltungshinweise and/or the main page of www.hl7.de for a list of scheduled meetings.
(you also may wish to sign up to the German language streams on this forum)
